returns._1: _data The metadata. Implementations can choose what data to return here. This implementation returns the roundID

poll().details: Spot oracles must implement but it will be a no-op

devdoc.title: The oracle management contract for chainlink V3 oracles

fromWad(int256).notice: Converts from a WAD value to a raw value based on the decimals in the feed

oracle().notice: The address of the feed oracle

poll().notice: Updates the underlying oracle state and returns the new price
